programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: With oyster season in full swing, Texas game wardens ensure everyone is following the rules on land and water. Hunters are investigated for trespassing on private property. The game wardens find an oyster boat deckhand with several warrants.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Across Texas, the wardens enforce the law during prime deer season. Bad weather conditions lead to a serious car wreck. A tipster reports an injured owl. A hunter harassment issue between neighbors is addressed. Illegal deer disposals are investigated.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A game warden has a run-in with an acrobatic squirrel. A Mexican shrimp boat may have an illegal catch. Fishing without a license leads to a trip to jail. A mystery UTV caught-on-tape has a surprising driver. Some kids are found in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The Game Wardens patrol the beach, lake and land, as summer is in full swing. Wardens educate a dog owner about leaving pets in the sun. An under-age drinker tells too many lies. Wardens inspect novice jet skiers on a busy recreational lake.

programme.desc: As summer winds down in Texas, game wardens enforce the law. While patrolling the Rio Grande, Game Wardens Gould and Hickerson spot people attempting to enter the United States illegally, and Game Warden Inman responds to a call from a hunting club.

programme.desc: Game wardens head to a home after getting a call about bucks fighting in Comal County. While patrolling the Brazos River, Kiel responds to a drowning in progress. A trespassing incident quickly turns into a drug case. Putnam hears shots fired nearby.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden McGee rushes to a domestic altercation. Game Wardens Zuniga and Roel run into trespassers, while Provasnik inspects a potentially stolen jet ski. Game Wardens Richards and McGee team up on an investigation, and a baby squirrel is rescued.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: When a 12-foot gator manages to trap itself in wires, the wardens are determined to set it free. Warden Boone responds to a domestic dispute call, and a grey fox is found trapped in a residential area. Meanwhile, a darted goose chase ensues.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Warden Gould responds to the call about an exotic red stag that was shot. In Hunt County, a plethora of warrants are dispersed for unpaid fishing violations, while Warden Flores and Williams join forces on the last day on patrol.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Texas, multiple boats are caught over-harvesting oysters and the wardens must handle an unruly captain. Then, when a fox is found dead on private property, an investigation begins to find the one responsible.

programme.desc: A tense confrontation ensues when Wardens Scott and Gould respond to a call about an illegal deer hunting case. A pair of raccoons find their way to a gas station and must be trapped, and Warden Boone handles a disgruntled hunter.

programme.desc: During deer hunting season, Wardens Gould and Scott respond to a call about finding carcasses on private property. Then, stray bullets are shot into a horse owner's home, while hunters are questioned about hunting illegally.

programme.desc: Warden Cummings deals with an angry man who blew a stop sign. Warden Boone helps chase a trio of armed robbers on the run, and Warden Inman investigates a group of suspected deer hunters for trespassing.

programme.desc: Game Wardens Mallory Mitchell and Jeremy Lindsey intervene when an overloaded boat and unruly jet skiers put lives at risk. Game Warden Randolph McGee investigates reports of a wild hog being tortured, while other game wardens round up a willy alligator.

programme.desc: A slew of poached birds is discovered on an abandoned boat, changing a missing person's search into a hunt for a hiding poacher. Game Wardens Mike Boone and Lauren Iles rescue a tangled 12-foot gator, while multiple boats are inspected on Lake Limestone.

programme.desc: In Liberty County, Game Warden Jake Noxon investigates a family for illegally keeping a pet deer, and farther south an alligator roams a garage. Game Warden Mike Boone joins forces with local police to track down armed suspects after a robbery.

programme.desc: As Warden Richards reminisces on his career during the last day on the job, he races to rescue a cow being attacked by a pack of hunting dogs. At the academy, new recruits wrangle a gator, while anglers are caught illegally fishing.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Wardens Richards and Roraback attend an accident.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf of Mexico, a routine inspection turns treacherous for Game Warden Carmen Rickel and the Marine Tactical Operations Group. Warden Kyle Hadley wrangles a rattlesnake found in a home, and underaged boaters are busted for alcohol on deck.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Suspicions flare when stray bullets strike an elderly couple's home and their neighbors are questioned. Game Wardens Raj Ataya and Clint Caywood rush to help an injured boater, and an overnight kayak patrol reveals campers throwing caution to the wind.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During a routine hunting license check, husband and wife Game Wardens Ben and Chelsea Bailey discover illegal drugs. Trespassers get caught in a dangerous restricted area, and Warden James Cummings races to track down a man threatening self-harm.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Matt Kiel and Michael Serbanic race to confront reckless jet skiers wreaking havoc at a boat ramp. A rogue ATV rider tries to lie his way out of a trespassing charge, and a crabber turns hostile when caught without a fishing license.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Foolhardy speedsters run afoul of wardens on a nighttime stakeout mission. Game Warden Mike Boone investigates reckless gunfire endangering life and property, and Game Warden Chelsea Bailey crosses paths with a wanted man during a routine safety check.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mike Boone and James Noxon question a felon suspected of illegally hunting with a firearm. Hunters are tracked down and interrogated after a suspicious sighting on private property, and a late-night shrimp boat search uncovers illegal fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Morgan Inman and Justin Eddins interrogate a group of hunters suspected of trespassing and theft. Lifeless ducks are found floating mysteriously in Port Aransas, and wardens hit the water before dawn to bust clandestine shrimpers.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Deep in the woods and bayous of Louisiana, Wildlife Agents protect the state's resources. A crab fisherman is caught stealing dozens of traps, a hunter crosses state lines with an illegal deer, and Agents rescue an injured bald eagle.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Jackson Parish, a reckless hunter is investigated for shooting down a highway. Meanwhile, Agents stake out a man suspected of two illegal deer kills, duck hunters are confronted for harassment and a crowded boat parade ends with citations.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Southern Louisiana, Lt. David Nunez and Sgt. Austin Arteaga investigate a group of bird hunters on opening day of Teal Season. Later, a repeated offender is busted for taking immature crabs and a late-night deer decoy leads to a hunter in handcuffs.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: While using the LDWF's 'spy-in-the-sky' drone, Agents track down a boat captain breaking the law in Plaquemines Parish. A family of shrimpers is investigated for pulling oversized nets, and two feuding fishermen are suspected of being under the influence.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: As a storm rolls in over St. Tammany Parish, Cpl. Blaine Wagner and Cpl. Rick Clark assist in a search and rescue mission for a missing fisherman. Agents confront a repeat offender for harassing hunters and a felon is caught with an illegal firearm.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The hidden kingdom of microscopic alien organisms shapes the universe as much as galaxies, stars, and planets. New discoveries reveal how bacteria, viruses, and other alien micro-organisms built life on Earth and influence humanity's future in the cosmos.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: An explosion in the discovery of exoplanets is challenging everything we know about our universe; experts use cutting-edge astronomy to investigate these mysterious alien worlds and how they defy the laws of physics.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: White dwarfs are small, dead stars with a dangerous side, capable of exploding into supernovas and destroying planets; new research suggests these mysterious phenomena may be the key to understanding the universe itself.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Our galaxy is full of stars ready to explode into supernovas, a stellar detonation powerful enough to destroy all life on Earth; it's an event that hasn't occurred in 400 years, and the search is on to locate which star may be next.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Transporting the gear of Formula E's ten electric-powered racing teams to cities around the world across more than 50,000 total kilometres in the greenest way imaginable is no easy task. For air transport, DHL uses Boeing 747 or 777 aircraft.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-2 Greyhound's design allows it a flexibility and access that few other fixed wing craft possess. For the U.S. Navy, it provides critical logistics support, flying 1,000 miles in a matter of hours and transporting high-priority cargo.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Follow the Stargazer carrier on its latest quest, taking to the sky to launch the Pegasus rocket delivering specialized weather satellites designed to detect the magnitude and intensity of hurricanes.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Baffinland Mines needs to get equipment to a remote mine in Nunavut to support shipping operations for the summer and have hired one of Volga-Dnepr's Ilyushin-76 (Il-76) aircraft to take on this timely operation.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The German Air Force is overhauling their entire fleet of outdated cargo planes, and replacing them with Airbus? Latest state-of-the-art military aircraft, the A400M, which can haul massive loads.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The Twin Otter is found around the world in jungles, deserts, mountains, the Arctic and anywhere rugged reliability and short-take-off-and-landing are needed. Powered by twin turboprop engines, the Twin Otter manoeuvres like a bird.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Investigate aspects of safety when a Greek ferry en route between Athens and the Island of Paros smashes into a rock and sinks. Killing 80 people, the crash has left many wondering how the vessel hit a rock that raises 25 metres out of the sea.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: A freight train rumbling through the calm suburb of San Bernardino, California, derails and crashed, destroying homes and taking lives. Less than two weeks later a pipeline, weakened in the cleanup of the derailment, explodes.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: When a hijacked Ethiopian Airlines flight runs out of fuel near the Comoros Island, a pilot must save the lives of the passengers. The pilot, who has been hijacked twice before, must rely on his skills as the plane plunges toward the sea from 31,000 feet.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In 1977, two fully loaded jumbo airliners suffer 583 casualties despite never leaving the ground at foggy Los Rodeos Airport in the Canary Islands.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: On August 2, 2005 Air France flight 358 burst into flames when it skidded off the runway in Toronto during a raging thunderstorm. More that 300 passengers and crew had only seconds to escape the burning plane.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Smoke starts filling the cabin and a bizarre shower of white sparks hits the windshield during a calm British Airways flight to Australia in 1982. Seconds before crashing into the Indian Ocean, the failing engines roar back to life.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Return adopters visit Villalobos to find a dog that will feel at home on their boat. Tania and Mariah head out to rescue a stray that is hiding beneath a shipping container. And parolee Jammall starts to slip up, risking his future at the rescue.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Wanting to give the senior dogs a special place, Lizzy, Tania, and Mariah create a 'retirement center' at one of the warehouses.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Dog Is
programme.desc: One of Earl's favourite senior dogs finally has a chance at a forever home. Tia heads to a small shelter in rural Louisiana to help with a hound that they took in. Tania, Mariah and Lizzy take on a project that showcases dogs in their forever homes.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos celebrates Halloween by throwing a costume party for dogs to help raise money for the rescue. An old friend from the TV crew comes to adopt a family member. Lizzy struggles to rescue a stray dog in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tania is shocked by what she finds once she gets a stray dog back to the rescue. An empty nester brings her family to Villalobos to help her find a companion. And, the family are determined to solve their messy pigeon problem.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Lizzy tries to track down the owner of a dog tied up outside the rescue. An older couple comes looking for their first dog, but their choice requires some special temperament testing. And, when a dog develops allergies, Mariah looks for a natural cure.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The family of Mutt, an employee who recently passed away, meets the dog that he chose for them. A stray near a middle school leads Tia and M2 on a wild good chase. And, Lizzy and Moe tackle the challenging task of renovating the dog agility course.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: As VRC braces for Hurricane Barry, Tia and her crew ensure the animals' safety and Mariah and Earl tend to a stray Labradoodle that has been shot. Later, a cancer survivor hopes to rescue an unwanted dog she loves called East.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 take to the water to prepare a pit bull for her forever home. A new parolee comes to Villalobos from Boston, hoping stay on track so that he can make his teenage son proud. A stray dog is near death when Lizzy and Heidi find him.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A Harley-loving adopter comes to Villalobos from Michigan. Mariah and Lizzy struggle to catch a stray pit in New Orleans East. When a litter of black pit-mix puppies are dropped off at the Sanctuary, Tia and M2 turn to social media to adopt them out.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When an aggressive dog is in danger of being put down, Tia heads to South Carolina to save him. A couple from Florida comes to VRC hoping to find a dog that will enjoy retired life with them. Parolee Toney Converse takes on more responsibility.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: As Moe and Lizzy reveal they are expecting a second child, parolee Spencer announces he's expecting his first.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Two strays lead Lizzy and Villalobos employees on a wild goose chase. A grandmother comes to Villalobos looking for another canine companion, but her dog Daisy has other plans. And, Tania pursues her dream to write a children's book.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A Pennsylvania prison offers to take twenty dogs from Villalobos. An emaciated pit bull fights for its life. A potential adopter travels from Michigan to meet a dog that stole her heart, but then is shocked when she comes face to face.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tania struggles to rescue a puppy that is hiding underneath a shed. A potential adopter comes to Villalobos hoping to find a companion for her dog, and she's only interested in seeing hounds. A beloved employee learns that he's finally off parole.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The crew helps pregnant Lizzy find an injured, older dog roaming the Ninth Ward; a long-time employee gets some exciting news about his future; Mariah helps a pooch battling tumor surgeries and is in need of a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When two lovable pups are dropped off at Villalobos' dog boutique, the VRC crew is determined to get them back to good health. Then, a young woman comes in searching for a canine perfect to experience the Big Easy lifestyle with her.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and Earl face a decision about an elderly hound needing medical attention at an Alabama shelter. An abandoned, aggressive dog is found roaming a trash-filled backyard, while Lizzy and Moe help a pair of potential adopters find their fur-ever friend.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia takes in a pit bull that was rescued from terrible conditions in Kuwait. An adopter travels from Michigan in hopes of finding a new best friend. When a stray dog ends up at Villalobos, Earl is determined to track down its owner.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When Kenani is in a serious motorcycle accident, Tia and the Villalobos crew must band together to ensure him a speedy recovery. A retired Marine visits the center to find a forever fur-friend, while Lizzy and Earl rescue a hound found in a parking lot.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia races to rescue four dogs from a rural shelter in Louisiana from euthanasia. Mariah and Toney give a scared, shy dog a shot at a forever home, while a unique canine gets a chance at a Pennsylvania prison dog program.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: VRC's favorite parolee gets arrested. A couple comes to Villalobos hoping to find a friend for their bulldog. Mariah and Spencer rescue a dog left behind at an abandoned home, only to find out that she's suffering from severe injuries.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada
programme.desc: Becky intensifies her efforts to harvest a moose; Pierre looks to the land for resupply; Hoping to expand his trap-line Bentley flies north to establish a new camp; 'Pike' Mike takes one last kick at the can in his quest to pad his winter larder.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Canada

programme.desc: A woman who has been renting for years is ready to buy a home, and her wish list includes a master bathroom with a big bathtub. Ben and Erin capitalize on the charm of the house and design a Nantucket-inspired kitchen and a stunning master suite.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: A minister and his wife are offered a clergy house, but the home is cramped with their family of seven. Ben and Erin share their vision for updating the space and show the couple the Collins House to give them a second, larger option.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: Actor Richard T. Jones and his wife, Nancy, fell in love with Mississippi and want to invest in the community. Their wish list includes a historical home with good bones, so Ben and Erin give it a classic Craftsman front porch and a colorful makeover.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A father is shot in the head just steps from a strip club. When Lt Joe Kenda traces the victim's last hours, the field of potential suspects grows, but no one will talk. The case is halted until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely gunman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a squabble at a store turns violent, Raymond Archuleta steps in to help- only to be stabbed through the heart. Lt Joe Kenda must solve the case with little evidence besides a bloody bouquet, and a sketch of the mystery woman last seen holding them.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a pilot is found dead in her trailer, police are stumped; until Lt Joe Kenda finds a startling connection between the victim and her killer. Then, Kenda is called to a bloody shooting, only to discover that the murder victim is an old family friend.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed 'unsolvable' by the veterans. But has the ambitious young investigator bitten off more than he can chew?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A popular army vet is found bleeding to death on the cold asphalt of a shadowy parking lot -his chest littered with too many knife wounds to count. A gruesome clue leads Kenda's team to an unlikely killer whose motive for murder is as heartless.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Kenda encounters one of the most horrendous crime scenes of his career, and he's lead to the most unexpected of killers. Then, a young soldier dies from a bullet to the neck from an apparent suicide, but the case soon spins in a whole new direction.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young father-to-be is shot dead in broad daylight by a single bullet fired from afar. At the crime scene, Kenda recognizes the hallmark of a skilled sniper. But with zero evidence at his disposal, he'll rely on shoe leather detective work.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A seemingly random attack leaves Mary Moebus dead. But when Lt Joe Kenda uncovers a cache of new evidence, he realizes someone's been lying. Then, a cryptic note leads Kenda to a luxurious bachelor pad with a bedroom soaked in blood.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Neighbors are stunned when close friends Louis Matos and Colleen Johnson are gunned down in cold blood. The case kicks into high gear when Lt. Joe Kenda locates a panic-stricken eyewitness who played an unwitting role in the bloodbath.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A shooter on a rampage leaves a her 24 year old woman dead, and her two year-old child clinging to life. Investigators pursue a convoluted trail that ultimately leads Lt. Joe Kenda face to face with a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 4th of July house party erupts in violence, and a young man is shot dead behind the wheel of a car. Lt. Joe Kenda must sort through a mountain of suspects, until a peculiar clue puts him hot on the heels of a self-styled gangster.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A decapitated body is discovered on some train tracks. To solve the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must listen to a voice from beyond the grave. Then, a young girl's body is found in basement. To find her killer, Kenda must expose a family secret.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A massive brawl erupts at a local bar ends with the shooting death of a young army soldier. To unravel the murder, Lt. Joe Kenda must infiltrate a revered military institution, and expose a dangerous vendetta.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When the lifeless body of Willie McCarty is found at the base of a staircase, neighbors direct Kenda to a mysterious truck spotted fleeing the scene. Then... Kenda must solve a bizarre case of poisoning at a busy downtown hospital.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: An ambush at a hamburger stand leaves a 16-year old dead. Lt. Joe Kenda must cut through rumor and innuendo in order to zero in on his prime suspect. But before he can catch the killer, a surprise witness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A romantic rendezvous is cut short by a violent home invasion, leaving young business owner Kelly Knudson bleeding to death on the floor. Lt Joe Kenda is short on leads, until he learns of an ex-roommate with an axe to grind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a mysterious explosion rocks a sleepy suburb, it's up to Kenda to ID a pile of charred remains and find the killer who triggered the blast. Then...a young mother's murder leads the CSPD on a harrowing car chase that ends in a violent showdown.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When martial arts enthusiast Carl Hunt suffers a fatal knife wound to the gut, his friends and neighbors offer few viable leads. But Kenda discovers a cache of blood evidence that proves he's being lied to.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Two grandparents are shot to death in their family home. Kenda's investigation kicks into high gear when his prime suspect flees for the Mexican border. Then...CSPD responders find a body so badly mutilated it turns the stomachs of seasoned officers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young mother-to-be is shot and left for dead. To catch her assailant, Kenda must elicit a death-bed confession from the victim herself. Then...a corpse found floating in Monument Creek leads Kenda to a mysterious encampment on a nearby riverbank.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a spate of violent robberies spreads terror across the city, Kenda and the major crimes unit are called in to bring the masked gunman to justice. But when the brazen bandit strikes yet again, it looks as if Kenda's case is going down in flames.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A jealous vendetta leaves a popular DJ dead, and his killer has dropped off the map. As a newly promoted supervisor, Sgt. Joe Kenda gambles his career on a risky strategy to bring his prime suspect to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a five-alarm fire, first responders discover a lifeless body. When Kenda learns that the deadly blaze was no accident, he launches a manhunt for a pyromaniac with a fiery temper and a callous disregard for human life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman's lifeless body is dumped on a lonely mountain pass. Leads are scarce, until a seemingly unrelated murder brings Kenda within arm's reach of her killer. But an unexpected roadblock will force him to make a painful decision.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Pamela Edwards is found shot through the heart, Lt. Joe Kenda's first task is to shield her young daughters from the horrendous scene. Soon police close in on her killer, ending with a white-knuckle car and foot chase across Colorado Springs.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old PJ Grant is found dead from a single gunshot wound to the head, Lt. Joe Kenda assumes it's a suicide. But when the physical evidence doesn't add up, it opens the door to a world of possibilities-from hatred to human sacrifice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When uninvited guests crash a barrio birthday party, violence erupts—leaving Enrique Urrutia dead and potentially sparking a gang war. To keep the peace, Lt. Joe Kenda must crack an unwritten code of silence and bring Enrique's killer to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Keith Andrews is killed, a man steps forward claiming he did it in self-defense-but Lt. Joe Kenda has his doubts. Then... Civil rights icon Gretchen McRae is found decomposing in her house. And that's not even the biggest secret on the premises.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.sub-title: We Kill the Ones We Love
programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves Van Terry dead; to crack the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must put his faith... in a burglar. Then...Cherie Bradley and her ex-boyfriend Anthony Carroll are found dead, and it's up to Kenda to discover which of their relatives did it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Cheryl Brantner's children find her dead in her bathtub, Lt. Joe Kenda must decide if this was a soapy accident or something worse. Then, a gathering of local tattoo artists turns ugly, leaving Philip Titus dead and the only suspects his peers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When young Iraq War veteran Curtis Ashley ends up dead, Lt. Joe Kenda has to solve the slaying of a seemingly innocent victim using just a mere shred of evidence and his keen awareness of the criminal mind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Vietnam War veteran Charles Walker is found unconscious, after a stabbing attack so savage even 45 units of blood couldn't save his life. It's up to Lt. Joe Kenda to follow the bloody trail of clues and piece together the victim's last moments.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Johnny Crawford is killed in his easy chair, police are perplexed to learn he may have been shot over a musical instrument. But as Lt. Joe Kenda digs deeper, it soon becomes clear the young man wasn't killed for his own sins...but someone else's.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a gunfight erupts at a local biker bar and claims the lives of two men, Lt. Joe Kenda must delve deep into the world of an infamous biker gang to determine if the cause behind the violent encounter was gang rivalry or something more personal.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: It's New Year's Eve weekend, and in the midst of the revelry Miguel Mendez is beaten to death outside a convenience store. Lt. Joe Kenda faces a challenging investigation, his only clues coming from a drunken witness and Miguel's strange injuries.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: George Ferribee, a loving son led astray by addiction, is found executed. When Lt. Joe Kenda learns the victim had recently been kidnapped, he assumes the crimes are related... but soon discovers things are much more complicated than he had expected.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When the severed head of a wife and mother is found, Lt. Joe Kenda uses forensics and interrogation to find both her body and her killer. Then... a young man's murder looks like a robbery gone wrong until Kenda learns the odd reason he's living there.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A star athlete is gunned down just weeks before starting college, leaving family heartbroken and detectives stumped. The young man seems an unlikely target, until Lt. Joe Kenda pries into his personal life and the events of his last night on earth.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.sub-title: Bullet With My Name on It
programme.desc: In his first year on the force, rookie patrol officer Joe Kenda quickly learns the ropes. But when he tries to singlehandedly stop a brawling mob, he finds himself facing down gunfire. Can Kenda help detectives catch the man who nearly killed him?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When two teens discover a lifeless body in the street, Lt. Joe Kenda must determine if the killer was a jealous lover or just plain unhinged. Then Kenda turns to a forensic expert to see if a young mother could possibly have hung herself.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down, leading Lt. Joe Kenda to delve into his troubled past and his connection to the world of rare coins. Then... a mother of five is shot in the head and it's up to Kenda to uncover the truth behind her untimely death.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda is faced with his worst nightmare when he learns a friend and fellow officer, Mark Dabling, has been killed in the line of duty. Police conduct an all-out manhunt and discover the gunman is even more dangerous than they'd thought.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Police are shocked to find a 13-year-old boy killed in an explosion, but their grief turns to alarm when they discover a second, unexploded bomb. To catch the killer, Det. Joe Kenda must first figure out whom the bomb was meant for.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When Julie Smith reports being sexually assaulted, Lt. Joe Kenda and his Sex Crimes Unit discover a terrifying similarity to other attacks on the east side of town. It's a race against the clock to catch a serial rapist before he strikes again.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: On the night before Halloween, a real-life nightmare unfolds when a young man is found clinging to life. The case takes a dark turn when Lt. Joe Kenda learns there is a second victim somewhere in the woods. Can police rescue him before it's too late?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A community is shocked when Antoine McKenzie is brazenly shot outside an auto parts store in broad daylight. But when no witnesses can identify the killer, the only lead left for Lt. Joe Kenda is a final message written in the victim's own blood.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When 71-year-old Orville Head passes away, no one questions the death of an elderly man with health problems. But when a tip comes in suggesting foul play, Lt. Joe Kenda is left with only one way to reveal the truth: exhume the body from its grave.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A gathering of friends turns deadly when two gunmen shoot William Davis in the head. When the witnesses are unable to provide any solid leads, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team dig into his past and start to suspect someone in William's circle is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine if it was bad brakes or bad intent. Then A shooting in a dive bar leads to a quick arrest, but Kenda can't quite shake the feeling that something is amiss.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda looks for answers in the death of Calvin Blair, a young man stabbed and left for dead on the roadside; when Alexandra Drake is shot in the face, she manages to tell police it was accidental but Kenda isn't so sure he believes her.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes when a beloved teacher is poisoned in her classroom. As doctors fight to save Barbara Lewis' life, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team delve into her personal affairs looking for clues but the biggest revelation comes from the poison itself.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A confrontation between enemies turns deadly, and Lt. Joe Kenda's best hope for answers lies with a grainy, dubbed-over surveillance tape. Then An elderly man is fighting for his life. Was it a slip-and-fall, or something infinitely more disturbing?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A cabin on the slopes of Pikes Peak catches fire, and a young sheriff's deputy is posted to guard the scene overnight. When he's found dead in his patrol car the next morning, his fellow lawmen must set aside their grief and hunt down his killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A fifteen-year old girl is reported missing, and Lt. Joe Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding her disappearance. Then When a family man is shot dead on his neighbor's doorstep, was it self-defense or coldblooded murder?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a crazed gunman terrorizes his neighborhood, officers put themselves in the line of fire to restore order. Then A man discovers his elderly father has been stabbed in the back. The knife itself turns out to be Lt. Joe Kenda's biggest clue.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a bomb explodes at the Pikes Peak National Bank, it's up to rookie detective Joe Kenda catch the culprits.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don't add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt for a secret eyewitness they've heard could crack the case wide open.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A budding teen romance ends when the young man is shot dead on their first date leaving a startled girl as the key to the case. Then A man is dead, his young wife has fled, and Kenda must figure out if she was present for his suicide or his murder.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the 'victim' could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun. The key to the case lies in the deal they were discussing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing. Then When Kenda investigates the mysterious death of a successful dentist, the case gets personal.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice. Then Police break up a domestic dispute and find a body in the bedroom.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a soon-to-be grandmother doesn't come home from work, her daughter knows something terrible must have happened and reports her missing. As the investigation unfolds, Lt. Joe Kenda realizes they could be dealing with a fledgling serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Events earlier in the day lead to a card game halted by gunfire and a young man's death. Also, when Lt. Joe Kenda responds to a double shooting, he and his team find themselves reminiscing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. As days go by with no sign of the baby or demands for ransom, sergeants Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she's been sold on the black market or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman's mangled body is found beside a lonely stretch of highway. When the coroner suspects foul play, Kenda is called in to solve the second homicide case of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The discovery of a family home littered with corpses tasks Kenda with unspooling the paranoid obsessions of a diseased mind, and forces him to confront his greatest fear. Then a deadly beating a cheap motel illuminates the dark underbelly of love.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda

programme.title: The Nature of Things
programme.desc: Sable Island, Nova Scotia, is home to the largest breeding colony of grey seals in the world. Using newly designed cameras attached to two female seals, we get an intimate look at the life of the grey seal.

programme.title: The Nature of Things

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Ready for another season of list racing, the 405 is hoping to put the past behind them, come together and make street racing fun again. But on race night, the same old games threaten to break them apart before they start.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The 405 is in California taking on Boddie and his group of racers, but the night is off to a bumpy start. With both money and pride on the line, see if Oklahoma can come together to take home the big win.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN head to Kansas to fish with the new and improved Gonorail. Back in Oklahoma, Ryan and Dominator repair broken cars in preparation for list racing, but when a driver gets out of control, the evening is brought to an abrupt end.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Monza gets a chance to come for the list after his wreck, Shawn makes plans to get back into the top five, Farmtruck and AZN find a fun use for discarded airbags. Later, drivers make up for the lack of racing the previous week.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN invite all the 405 racers out to Willow Springs International Raceway for a road race competition. The racers have to pair up to compete in a time attack competition where the pair with the fastest combined times will take home $10,000.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN can't say no to an invitation to Summernats, an annual burnout competition in Australian. They ship a new truck to Australia, and get some help to get the truck ready in time to learn the true definition of burning rubber.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Ryan Martin looks over his car while Chief and Dave push each other in a competitive testing session, as they all get ready for another chance at number one. At race time, the racers fight to move up the list until broken cars slow everyone down.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Nearing the end of the list racing season, the racers make big decisions in a last ditch effort to movie up the list. On race night, untested cars mean big problems.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With the last list race of the season, the racers get their cars ready while Farmtruck and AZN fish out some fancy cars at cruise night. On race night, a costly mistake threatens to derail Chief.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Boosted holds a shootout for 10k in Ohio, while OKC prepares to take on Texas in a massive Cash Days showdown for $33,000.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.sub-title: Cash Days: Another Brick in the Wall
programme.desc: OKC and Texas compete in an old school Cash Days race. Eight drivers from each state race for over $30,000 and the chance to prove that their state has the fastest racers in the country, but a sketchy road throws a wrench into the works for both sides.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: On the second night of Cash Days, 405 racers must match up and race, while still fighting to knock out the only remaining Texas driver. The sketchy road is still in play, and it becomes a tuner's game to see who can get down the street in one piece.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After dominating the track, the once-mighty kings of the street return to reclaim their roots. Feeling like drivers have gotten soft, Chief puts the 405 to test with the most important list shakeup ever. Chief and Murder Nova part ways.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief, Dave, Ryan, Monza and Dominator battle for the number one spot as the list shakeup continues. Chief hopes to prove that his split with Shawn hasn't slowed him down. Ryan gets some advice from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrifying crash brings a racer to terms that his racing days might be over. For the first time in list history, Chief and Shawn must find what it takes to win without the other's help.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A familiar face returns to the 405's list, bringing with him a new car with scary potential. Working on his own, Shawn tries to prove to his son he has what it takes to climb the ranks.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After a series of bad passes, Shawn is determined to get the Murder Nova driving straight again. Monza challenges Ryan Martin for the number one spot on the top ten list. Farmtruck and AZN put the Jeeper Sleeper up against a tuned-up BMW.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrific crash devastates the 405 as Kamikaze returns to defend The List against a new racer hoping to earn a spot. Shawn makes a big change in an attempt to turn things around and Ryan Martin wastes no time calling out Monza.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN bring back an epic third annual Daily Driver contest where racers show up with everything from a golf cart to a Corvette to compete for big stacks of cash.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Daily Driver field is down to 18. With a new set of rules and a new road to race on, competition gets crazy. But only one driver will take home the cash prize.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.sub-title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: In the back half of the season, Ryan Martin, Eric K and Robin Roberts lead the field in points. With a couple of good passes and support from a fellow teammate, Kye Kelley hopes to push his way into the top three.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings: Team Attacks
programme.desc: Racers arrive in Idaho for the next Team Attack race. At high altitude, thin air proves to be a challenge for blower and nitrous cars alike. OKC, NOLA and the Dean's List are ahead of the pack and they're all pushing to add to their totals.

programme.desc: The drivers draw chips to determine their next matchup. Many teammates find themselves facing off against each other, and no one's pulling any punches.

programme.desc: Three competitors put their cars on the line for a chance to be the wheelman in a real-life high-speed chase.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: A Telsa, a '66 Impala Wagon and an S2000 try to outrun an elite team of pursuers in a real-life high-speed car chase. A wrong turn sends one driver over the edge, while another getaway ends in shockingly painful fashion.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Competition heats up in the compound and the pursuers are taking prisoners. One driver learns a painful lesson, while the others run for their lives.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: A stunt driver, a drift instructor and an exotic car salesman get the chance to live their ultimate driving fantasy: wheelmen in their very own high-speed car chase. But for one getaway driver, fantasy quickly turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Two confident young drifters arrive at the compound with a BMW E36 and a modded-out Mustang. The more experienced third driver has come teach these youngsters a lesson.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Heavy rain transforms the compound into a wet-and-wild wasteland. A '55 dodge pickup, Nissan 240SX and a '94 Ford Taurus scour the compound for traction and an exit as the pursuers try to stop them at all costs.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: History is made at the compound when one getaway driver takes the pursuers on the longest run ever.

programme.title: Getaway Driver
programme.desc: Three all-wheel drive vehicles enter the compound looking for a fight.

programme.desc: It's New Year's Eve weekend, and in the midst of the revelry, Miguel Mendez is beaten to death outside a convenience store; Lt. Joe Kenda faces a challenging investigation, his only clues coming from a drunken witness and Miguel's strange injuries.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a retired military man runs over a pedestrian, it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine if the accident was the result of bad brakes or bad intent; a shooting in a dive bar leads to a quick arrest, but Kenda can't shake feelings of unease.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman is found in the mountains, naked and covered in blood; Detective Joe Kenda's investigation leads him to uncover a world of violence and sexual fetishes, culminating in the most intense interrogation of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The slaying of a young boy has Lt. Joe Kenda facing his most difficult case yet; while confronting his own demons brought forth by this tragic case, the detective makes the most consequential decision of his career.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: In Greensboro, N.C., 19-year-old Tyarra Williams vanishes from the parking lot of her apartment complex; after receiving tips that Williams may have fallen prey to human trafficking, her grandfather embarks on a cross-country search for answers.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: In Asheville, N.C., 18-year-old Zebb Quinn vanishes after leaving work at Walmart; later, his parents are stunned when police find unusual evidence surrounding the disappearance of this shy young man.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Twenty-one year-old Kortne Stouffer vanishes from her bed one night following a couple of scuffles with neighbors and friends.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Logan Schiendelman vanishes, and authorities find his car abandoned; multiple tips claim seeing Logan, but searches turn up nothing; with no evidence of foul play, questions surface and police are forced to examine his family's controversial past.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Military veteran Michael VanZandt disappears one night in Hermosa Beach, Calif.; police suspect a group of strangers may be involved, while VanZandt's loved ones are haunted by suspicions about his thrill seeking make-up.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: After transgender teenager Sage Smith goes missing In Charlottesville, Va., police identify a suspect, then evidence comes to light forcing them to take a closer look at Smith's inner circle.

programme.title: Disappeared: Finding Andrea
programme.desc: A social media frenzy overshadows the search for missing mom Andrea Knabel (New!).

programme.title: Disappeared: Finding Andrea
programme.desc: Andrea's case takes a dark turn when volunteers suspect one of their own (New!).

programme.title: Disappeared: Finding Andrea
programme.desc: Andrea's family faces difficult possibilities regarding her disappearance; new details suggest Andrea had some serious personal struggles in the weeks before she vanished (New!).

programme.title: Disappeared: Finding Andrea
programme.desc: New information given to police gives Andrea's loved ones hope (New!).

programme.title: Disappeared: Finding Andrea
programme.desc: New information given to police gives Andrea's loved ones hope (New!).

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Chad and Jo meet by chance and to this pair of free spirits, their connection feels cosmic; they fall in love and move far from everyone they know; but soon their new life is ripped apart by jealous ex-partners.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Jeff and Jeanine Glanda have a picture-perfect family until selfishness and a shameless affair mark the beginning of the end; as money troubles and the threat of divorce breed paranoia and hate, a plot is hatched in the dark heart of a killer.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: In Alaska, the abduction and murder of an 11-year-old girl causes townspeople to fear they're being preyed upon by an evil outsider until investigators unmask a killer closer to home.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: Baffled by the animal instincts of a cross-country killer whose crimes seem to go dormant in winter, authorities follow his tracks to a den of deceit in the frozen tundra of Alaska.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: When a Pittsburgh doctor is found slashed to death in his bathtub, detectives must develop a psychological profile of the killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: A police officer is gunned down while on a midnight patrol, and her attacker flees with her squad car and weapon.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: In Minnesota, Morna Brennen disappears from an icy parking lot, then her body parts start showing up in the area along with cryptic clues.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: In New York, a home healthcare worker disappears on an icy night, and her loved ones lead the search for her safe return, then a series of incoming text messages and a missed call reveal a soul-crushing truth about what happened to her.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers
programme.desc: After a single mother vanishes in Wisconsin, police learn she was recently stalked by two men at a bar.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Surrounded by a big, loving family, high achiever Keonte Chavis goes missing, then she is found strangled to death in the woods, and the perpetrator turns out to be a family member.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When outgoing Beth Spaulding and shy Jason Risenburg meet, it looks like a match made in heaven; however, illness and bad luck trigger a tornado of lies and deception that tears them apart.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: After Ohioan Richard Beasley vanishes, police discover that an online monster has been luring local men to their deaths.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Young parents Adrienne and James Magee work hard to provide a stable life for their three small children in rural Louisiana. However, beneath the idyllic scenes lurks a dark secret, culminating in a heinous double-murder at the hands of a loved-one.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: A father-of-two disappears right before starting a new job; his wife has no idea where he went, while his friends hint that he led a secret, sordid life; the man's disappearance remains a mystery for years until a tip reveals the jaw-dropping truth.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Tattoo artist Amber Andrews and snowboarder Brandon Duran have a tumultuous marriage when a shocking secret breaks the surface and reveals a betrayal that leads to murder.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Brett and Mona Wehde live a quiet life in rural Iowa raising their three children; when a new family arrives, relationships are made, but behind closed doors, a wicked plot is hatched.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: Tabatha Spake grows up in an adoring home, but by the time she's a teenager, she longs for a different kind of love; just when she finally finds happiness, a monster turns her dreams into a nightmare.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When teenager LaTonya Taylor gets pregnant, her mum vows to support her no matter what, but someone's hiding resentment that will destroy the whole family (New!).

programme.title: Relentless: Missing in Missouri
programme.desc: Christina Whittaker vanishes without a trace; her mother Cindy refuses to give up hope; filmmaker Christina Fontana pledges to find the truth about their missing daughter; as she digs deeper, it's clear nothing is as it seems (New!).

programme.title: On the Case With Paula Zahn
programme.desc: After a young girl disappears from her bus stop, a search reveals that her terrifying abduction has ended in a homicide; as police mount a tireless search to find her killer, the community rallies together to get justice for Angie.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: When teenager LaTonya Taylor gets pregnant, her mum vows to support her no matter what, but someone's hiding resentment that will destroy the whole family (New!).

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: Amiable slacker David Wozniak (Vince Vaughn) drives a delivery truck for his family's company and is content with a life of mediocrity. However, when he learns that he is the biological father of more than 500 offspring and many of them are suing to learn his identity, he decides to hold himself accountable for his actions. He finds some of his progeny and becomes involved in their lives; however, when David's girlfriend announces her pregnancy, she keeps her expectations low.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: Jimmie and his best friend Mont try to reclaim the house built by Jimmie's grandfather, launching them on a poignant odyssey that connects them to their past, even as it tests their friendship and sense of belonging in the place they call home.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: Native islander Matt King (George Clooney) lives with his family in Hawaii. Their world shatters when a tragic accident leaves his wife in a coma. Not only must Matt struggle with the stipulation in his wife's will that she be allowed to die with dignity, but he also faces pressure from relatives to sell their family's enormous land trust. Angry and terrified at the same time, Matt tries to be a good father to his young daughters, as they too try to cope with their mother's possible death.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Once inseparable pals, Dave (Jason Bateman) and Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) have drifted apart over the years. Dave is an overworked lawyer and family man, while Mitch has thus far avoided most of the normal responsibilities of adulthood. Each is envious of the other's life, and following a drunken binge, the men awake to find they have somehow switched bodies. Dave and Mitch soon discover that things are not as rosy as they seemed and try to find a way to return their lives to normal.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life. Suddenly under siege, the friends seem headed to the point of no return -- unless one man can reach them in time.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.desc: When someone from Ian's past dies of COVID-19, Mickey has to accept the facts about Ian's past relationships, the dynamics of their relationship and the men they both married.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.sub-title: Kev & V: God Doesn't Give With Both Hands
programme.desc: When Kev and V find out Gemma has been flunking zoom school, they're forced to face their fears of their own inadequacies as parents to help Gemma get back on track.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.sub-title: Lip: Once Upon a Phillip Gallagher
programme.desc: When baby Fred comes down with a head cold, Lip tells him a story he's never heard before to try and help him get some rest.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.sub-title: Debbie, Carl & Liam: They Grow Up So Fast
programme.desc: When Liam's quarantine girlfriend breaks up with him for being a Gallagher, Carl and Debbie join forces to help their little brother figure out how to get her back, despite sort of hating each other.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.desc: In interviews for a reality dating show, the Gallaghers reminisce about their beautiful, tough-as-nails sister who for so many years kept the lights on and a roof over their heads.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.desc: After a lifetime of scheming to beat the system and support his many vices, Frank Gallagher, is visited by the ghosts of his past, present and future.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Following a ridiculously awful flight that leads to his pet's death, Nashawn Wade (Kevin Hart) files a lawsuit against the airline, and wins a multimillion-dollar settlement. Determined to create a better flying experience, Nashawn starts his own airline, one that caters to an African-American clientele. Going into business with a tricked-out plane piloted by the smooth Capt. Mack (Snoop "Doggy" Dogg), the airline hits a snag when it has to deal with the family of Elvis Hunkee (Tom Arnold).

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: This sequel to the 2002 film returns to the Chicago barbershop owned by Calvin Palmer Jr. (Ice Cube). His employees -- Isaac (Troy Garity), Terri (Eve), Ricky (Michael Ealy), Dinka (Leonard Earl Howze) and Kenard -- have their own personal and workplace problems, and a new barbershop called Nappy Cutz has moved in across the street. As Calvin tries to change the character of his business, Nappy Cutz and gentrification become a threat to the surrounding community.

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2: Destination London
programme.desc: Teenage spy Cody Banks (Frankie Muniz) returns for another mission, and this time around he has a new partner, the humorous and amiable Derek Bowman (Anthony Anderson). Cody and Derek must travel to England to foil the plot of Victor Diaz (Keith Allen), a villainous operative who aims to wreak havoc with experimental mind-control technology. Joining Cody and Derek is pretty British schoolgirl Emily Sommers (Hannah Spearritt), who turns out to be a fellow undercover spy.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Love Spreads
programme.desc: Tensions rise when members of an all-female rock band gather to record their second album.

programme.title: Downeast
programme.desc: A dive into the often ignored seedy underbelly of Maine combining crime, revenge and the hope for a new life.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: Lifelong friends and now roommates, Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) are buried under a mountain of debt. When the electricity is turned off, they realize that desperate times call for desperate measures. They decide to make an adult film to raise some cash. Though they swear that having sex will not damage their friendship, their business proposition quickly turns into something much more.

programme.title: Zola
programme.desc: Zola, a Detroit waitress, is seduced into a weekend of stripping in Florida for some quick cash -- but the trip becomes a sleepless 48-hour odyssey involving a nefarious friend, her pimp and her idiot boyfriend.

programme.title: Queenpins
programme.desc: A frustrated suburban housewife and her best friend hatch an illegal coupon-club scheme that scams millions from corporations and delivers deals to legions of fellow coupon clippers. Hot on their trail is an unlikely duo -- a hapless loss-prevention officer and a determined U.S. postal inspector -- both looking to end their criminal enterprise.

programme.title: Crisis
programme.desc: A drug trafficker organizes a smuggling operation while a recovering addict seeks the truth behind her son's disappearance.

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: The Comedy Vaccine
programme.desc: The comic performs his fifth stand-up comedy special in Tempe, Ariz., focusing on COVID-19 and offering his views on mask culture, fatherhood and why 2020 was the best year to fart in public.

programme.title: Martin Eden
programme.desc: After Martin Eden meets Elena, he tries to achieve a place among the literary elite through self-education.

programme.title: Borg vs. McEnroe
programme.desc: It's the summer of 1980, and Björn Borg is the top tennis player in the world, dominating the sport both on and off the court. A powerful and rigorously disciplined player, there is only one obstacle in his pursuit of a record-breaking fifth Wimbledon championship: the highly talented but ferociously abrasive young American John McEnroe. With three days until the tournament begins, Borg trains religiously in his lavish Monaco home, aided by his coach and mentor Lennart and girlfriend Mariana.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff
programme.desc: During the 1840s, six settlers and their guide are caught in a dangerous situation: They are lost, food and water are running out, and the surrounding desert threatens to claim them all. Meanwhile, their guide, Stephen Meek (Bruce Greenwood), refuses to acknowledge that they may be several weeks off-course. When a Native American (Rod Rondeaux) is captured, Emily Tetherow (Michelle Williams), one of the settlers, shields him from Meek's wrath, and he offers to lead the group to water in return.

programme.title: The Real Charlie Chaplin
programme.desc: Combining unheard audio recordings, dramatic reconstructions and personal archives, filmmakers Peter Middleton and James Spinney trace Charlie Chaplin's meteoric rise from the slums of Victorian London to the heights of Hollywood superstardom.

programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: Davey Stone (Adam Sandler), a 33-year old party animal, finds himself in trouble with the law after his wild ways go too far. In keeping with the holiday spirit, the judge gives Davey one last chance at redemption -- spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail. Davey thinks he's gotten off easy until he meets Whitey Duvall, the eccentric, elf-like head referee.

programme.title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
programme.desc: A man (Casey Affleck) takes the fall for his lover's (Rooney Mara) crime, then four years later breaks out of prison to find her and their young daughter, who was born during his incarceration.

programme.title: The Hummingbird Project
programme.desc: Cousins Vincent and Anton are players in the high-stakes game of high-frequency trading, where winning is measured in milliseconds. Their dream is to build a straight fiber-optic cable line between Kansas and New Jersey, making them millions, but nothing is straightforward for this flawed pair. Anton is the brains, Vincent is the hustler, and together they push each other and everyone around them to the breaking point with their daring adventure.

programme.title: Mid90s
programme.desc: In 1990s Los Angeles, a 13-year-old spends his summer navigating between a troubled home life and a crew of new friends he meets at a skate shop.

programme.title: Adam Sandler's Eight Crazy Nights
programme.desc: Davey Stone (Adam Sandler), a 33-year old party animal, finds himself in trouble with the law after his wild ways go too far. In keeping with the holiday spirit, the judge gives Davey one last chance at redemption -- spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail. Davey thinks he's gotten off easy until he meets Whitey Duvall, the eccentric, elf-like head referee.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Douglas Quaid (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is a bored construction worker in the year 2084 who dreams of visiting the colonized Mars. He visits "Rekall," a company that plants false memories into people's brains, in order to experience the thrill of Mars without having to travel there. But something goes wrong during the procedure; Quaid discovers that his entire life is actually a false memory and that the people who implanted it in his head now want him dead.

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: Even More Funny Women of a Certain Age
programme.desc: Golden Globe winner Teri Hatcher joins the stage with some of the funniest women in comedy for one night of over-the-top, uninhibited standup.

programme.title: Carmen Jones
programme.desc: Screen version of the musical "Carmen Jones," which adapted Bizet's opera Carmen for an African-American cast. A soldier falls for Dandridge, a seductive factory worker. The lovers flee after the soldier kills his sergeant, but Carmen's taunting faithlessness drives her lover to a crime of passion.

programme.title: The Book of Life
programme.desc: In the Mexican town of San Angel, Manolo (Diego Luna), Maria (Zoë Saldana) and Joaquin (Channing Tatum) have been friends ever since childhood. Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: Dapper Koala Buster Moon presides over a once-grand theater that has fallen on hard times. An eternal optimist, and a bit of a scoundrel, he loves his theater above all and will do anything to preserve it. Facing the crumbling of his life's ambition, he takes one final chance to restore his fading jewel to its former glory by producing the world's greatest singing competition. Five contestants emerge: a mouse, a timid elephant, a pig, a gorilla and a punk-rock porcupine.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: Dapper Koala Buster Moon presides over a once-grand theater that has fallen on hard times. An eternal optimist, and a bit of a scoundrel, he loves his theater above all and will do anything to preserve it. programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

Although their lives have taken different paths -- Maria was sent to Europe, Joaquin joined the military, and Manolo studied to become a bullfighter -- one thing remains the same: Manolo and Joaquin both want to marry Maria. Little does the trio know that battling husband-and-wife deities have made a high-stakes wager on the love triangle's outcome.

programme.title: The Rocket Man
programme.desc: An orphan (George Winslow) zaps his town with a spaceman's ray gun that makes people tell the truth.

programme.title: How to Steal a Million
programme.desc: Charles Bonnet (Hugh Griffith) expresses his passion for art by forging masterpieces -- and selling them at a hefty profit. The trouble starts when his reproduction of a prized sculpture winds up in a famous Paris museum. If experts determine that it is inauthentic, Bonnet's reputation will be tarnished. That's why his fetching daughter, Nicole (Audrey Hepburn), hires cat burglar Simon Dermott (Peter O'Toole) to steal the sculpture back before it's too late.

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: When Philip Ashley's (Richard Burton) wealthy cousin, Ambrose (John Sutton), dies suddenly, his suspicions drift to Ambrose's new and icy wife, Rachel (Olivia de Havilland), who stands to benefit greatly from his cousin's death. When Ashley is introduced to Rachel at Ambrose's funeral, however, his fears are immediately laid to rest: how could such a beautiful young woman possibly be a murderer? But when the estate is left to Ashley, he begins to fear for his life.

programme.title: Carmen Jones
programme.desc: Screen version of the musical "Carmen Jones," which adapted Bizet's opera Carmen for an African-American cast. A soldier falls for Dandridge, a seductive factory worker. The lovers flee after the soldier kills his sergeant, but Carmen's taunting faithlessness drives her lover to a crime of passion.

programme.title: Eyewitness
programme.desc: New York City custodian Daryll Deever (William Hurt) is a big fan of local news reporter Tony Sokolow (Sigourney Weaver), so he is intrigued when she shows up to cover a story at his workplace. There's been a murder in the office building, and Tony suspects that Daryll may have insight into the crime, a notion that he furthers to stay close to her. However, when those behind the killing begin to think that Daryll really knows something, they target both him and Tony to keep their secrets hidden.

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Genetically engineered from conception to be the perfect killing machine, he's the culmination of decades of research, endowed with unprecedented strength, speed, stamina and intelligence. Known only as Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), his latest target is a corporation that plans to unlock the secret of his past to create an army of killers even more powerful than him. With help from a young woman, the elite assassin confronts revelations about his own origins in an epic battle with his deadliest foe.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: Luke Wright (Jason Statham) is a two-bit cage fighter, until the day he throws a fixed match. In retaliation, the Russian mob murders his family and destroys his life. Though alone and haunted by grief, Luke springs into action to save a Chinese girl (Catherine Chan) from the same gangsters who killed his family -- and lands in the middle of a high-stakes war. The girl is no ordinary child; she's a math prodigy who holds in her head a numerical code for which various factions are ready to kill.

programme.title: The Expendables
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) and his loyal men take on what they think is a routine assignment: a covert operation to invade the South American country of Vilena and overthrow its dictator. But, when they learn that the job will be a suicide mission, they must choose redemption or the destruction of their brotherhood.

programme.title: The Expendables 2
programme.desc: Mercenary leader Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone), Lee Christmas (Jason Statham) and the rest of the Expendables team reunite when Mr. Church (Bruce Willis) hires them for a seemingly easy job. But things go terribly wrong, compelling the mercenaries to seek revenge for a comrade's murder. With the odds against them, Barney and his team are hell-bent on payback and cut a path of destruction through opposing forces, only to encounter an unexpected threat: six pounds of weapons-grade plutonium.

programme.title: The Expendables 3
programme.desc: Years ago, Barney Ross (Sylvester Stallone) co-founded the Expendables with Conrad Stonebanks (Mel Gibson). After Stonebanks became an arms dealer, Ross was forced to kill him -- or so he thought. Now, Stonebanks is back and he's on a mission to end the Expendables. Ross decides that the way to fight old blood is with new blood, so he assembles a team of younger, faster, more tech-savvy recruits. The battle to topple Stonebanks becomes a clash of old-school methods vs. high-tech expertise.

programme.title: The Expendables
